report.title: Track-a-Tree : Data Download Report v2
report.description: Details of all sites, trees and visits. To be used to download all the data for analysis.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM locations site JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=site.id JOIN locations tree ON tree.parent_id=site.id AND tree.deleted=FALSE JOIN samples registration ON registration.location_id=tree.id AND registration.deleted=FALSE AND registration.survey_id=#survey_id# AND registration.sample_method_id = #registration_sample_method_id# JOIN occurrences tree_occ ON tree_occ.sample_id=registration.id AND tree_occ.deleted=FALSE JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists tree_cttl ON tree_occ.taxa_taxon_list_id = tree_cttl.id JOIN samples visit ON visit.location_id = tree.id AND visit.deleted=FALSE AND visit.survey_id=#survey_id# AND visit.sample_method_id = #visit_sample_method_id# JOIN occurrences visit_occ ON visit_occ.sample_id=visit.id AND visit_occ.deleted=FALSE JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists visit_cttl ON visit_occ.taxa_taxon_list_id = visit_cttl.id #joins# WHERE #website_filter# AND site.deleted=FALSE AND site.location_type_id=#top_type_id# #filters# #order_by#
report.field_sql: site.id as site_indicia_location_id, tree.id as tree_indicia_location_id, registration.id as tree_registration_indicia_sample_id, tree_occ.id as tree_selection_indicia_occurrence_id, visit.id as visit_indicia_sample_id, visit_occ.id as taxon_specific_visit_indicia_occurrence_id, site.name as site_name, site.centroid_sref as site_central_grid_ref, tree.name as tree_id, tree.centroid_sref as tree_grid_ref, tree.comment as tree_additional_information, tree_cttl.taxon as tree_species, registration.date_start as tree_selection_date, visit.date_start as visit_date, visit.comment as visit_field_diary, visit_cttl.taxon as taxon

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: top_type_id
param.description: Select the location_type_id for the top level locations.

param.name: siteattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include for the site

param.name: treeattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include for the tree

param.name: visitattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include for the visit

param.name: taxonattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include for the taxa

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user

param.name: site_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the site

param.name: tree_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the tree
